name: Wikipedia - Firefox Theme
description: This theme is for use with the Wikipedia - Layout, enhanced layout and may not display properly on other layouts. This is my brand-new Firefox-themed Wikipedia skin! It's based off of code from grom's Wikipedia - Dark, blue, simple style. It adds a super-nice wallpaper with Firefox's old (pre-23.0) logo in the upper right-hand corner (credit goes to jb55 for the background). The theme is designed to make Wikipedia much easier to use while also making it look better. Download it today and try it for yourself!
additional_info:
1.1 Improve support for larger monitors by anchoring background image to the right and filling the empty space on the left side with a matching solid orange color
1.0 - First version.
